keyMoments.title: Luffy Defeats Enel and Rings the Golden Bell
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy delivers the final blow that defeats Enel and causes the Golden Bell to ring, liberating Sky Island.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the successful completion of the Straw Hats' adventure on Sky Island and their role in ending the 400-year war.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Victory Shadow Visible from Jaya
keyMoments.description: Luffy's triumphant shadow is projected onto the clouds, visible to Cricket and allies on Jaya below, confirming the crew's success.
keyMoments.significance: Provides visual confirmation of the crew's safety and victory to their allies.

keyMoments.title: Crew Discusses Next Moves
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats discuss what to do next, with Zoro noting they're still broke, and Luffy and Usopp vetoing Nami's suggestion to leave immediately.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's dynamics and sets up their continued exploration of Sky Island.

keyMoments.title: Hears the Golden Bell from Jaya
keyMoments.description: Cricket and the Saruyama Brothers hear the sound of the Golden Bell ringing from the sky, proving the City of Gold exists and validating their support of the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Provides emotional payoff for the alliance's assistance to the Straw Hats and vindicates Cricket's ancestor.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Luffy's Shadow on the Clouds
keyMoments.description: The alliance sees Luffy's triumphant shadow projected on the clouds, confirming the Straw Hats' safety and success.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms that the crew they helped reach Sky Island succeeded in their adventure.
